title: 'The brain runs on 20 watts': Anupam Mittal on why AI won’t replace humans anytime soon

As fear grips the villages, young men patrol their neighbourhoods at nights while the children, women, and the elderly stay home after sundown, finds Ishita Mishra

Police faced an uphill battle enforcing the ban amidst a sea of vehicles, leading to growing frustration over both the clarity of the rule and its effectiveness in combating pollution.

title: GOAT India Tour: Gavaskar slams Messi for Kolkata ruckus - 'Failed to honour commitment'
description: Sunil Gavaskar challenges the narrative blaming Kolkata's Messi event on the organisers. He argues the focus should be on whether Messi himself fulfilled his commitments. Gavaskar suggests that if Messi's team failed to honour agreed-upon activities, they, not local mismanagement, were the primary culprits. He urges checking commitments on both sides before assigning blame.

description: A human resources executive, Kristin Cabot, has broken her silence after being filmed embracing her married CEO boss on a giant screen at a Coldplay concert. She described the moment as a single, alcohol-fueled mistake, not a sexual relationship, and has since faced intense public shaming and death threats.

title: Inside Josh Allen’s luxury car collection: A look at the Bills star’s garage
description: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen's impressive car collection showcases his journey from humble beginnings to NFL stardom. His garage features a mix of rugged trucks like the Ford F-150 Raptor and luxury SUVs such as the Jeep Grand Wagoneer and Range Rover Sport, reflecting his need for utility and comfort in Buffalo's climate.

title: Braun Strowman & Raquel Rodriguez net worth 2025: WWE earnings, lifestyle
description: Braun Strowman and Raquel Rodriguez showcase contrasting WWE financial journeys in 2025. Strowman, a former headliner, boasts an estimated net worth of $2-5 million, built on lucrative deals and merchandise. Rodriguez, a rising star, has a projected $700,000, with her value steadily increasing through television exposure and championship opportunities.

title: 'She cant breathe, We kept yelling': ICE pin down, drag pregnant woman — watch
How police secretly tracked missing coach Travis Turner before abuse charges
description: Experts believe fugitive football coach Travis Turner was likely caught through a secret police sting or flagged online activity. Authorities say Turner faces 10 child pornography-related charges. While police remain silent, criminologists told the Daily Mail that undercover officers, tech company reports, or device searches likely led to the case.

title: 'Gemini 3 can do things that Copilot can’t': Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman
description: Microsoft's AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, acknowledged Google's Gemini 3's capabilities while highlighting Copilot's unique strengths, particularly in real-time visual interaction. He emphasized Microsoft's commitment to developing AI that serves human interests, drawing a firm line against autonomous systems that could become uncontrollable. This stance follows a revised OpenAI agreement.

title: Gisele Bündchen spotted jet skiing in Florida with Joaquim Valente
description: Gisele Bündchen and Joaquim Valente embraced a sun-drenched holiday with a jet ski outing near their Florida home, prioritizing family and privacy after welcoming their son. This choice reflects Bündchen's current focus on grounding moments and personal strength over public spectacle. Meanwhile, Tom Brady confirmed his NFL retirement is permanent due to his ownership stake in the Raiders.
